ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Newbie project stats
ygData.msgSnippet: They are part of a research quest for pure casters. :P You can only carry one at a time though. Bah.
ygData.messageBody:
They are part of a research quest for pure casters. :P You can only carry
one at a time though. Bah.

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Webber, Jessica [mailto:webber@...]
>Sent: Friday, June 30, 2000 7:47 AM
>To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Newbie project stats
>
>
>On a related note, is there ANYTHING in all of Norrath that you can do with
>a burned out lightstone? I know most people destroy them, but I can get so
>much as a copper/faction for these just say how.
>
>Peace
>Evulia
>
>> Left out 1 important point...
>>
>> You need a magic weapon to fight wisps. I think if you sing
>> COD and hymn
>> with lute equipped you can take one down. You might have to
>> run and heal.
>> At level 12 throw in a bellow also and you should be OK. I
>> had saved up for
>> a Dragoon Dirk by this time.
>>
>> Tomerrilin
>>
>>
